TopicTitle: Invisible Planets in my Solar System

Articles.Content:
I've been trying to install a version of Real Solar System but can't quite find the right files. I would like to play with real planet names and textures with the planets as close to stock Kerbal size as possible. I have been all over the internet trying to figure out the right combination of resources. I'm close. With the following combination of mods my game loads and a real earth model appears on my splash screen but when I get to the game my launch pad is resting on an invisible planet! In the sky I see a beautiful milky way bit nothing else. Below is a screen shot of what I have installed. Can anyone see what I'm still missing?
http://peteyboy.net/PICS/Capture.JPG
 
Thanks.

Can you share us your logs? More specifically the Kopernicus log, as that will show us why exactly the planets aren't loading.

Edited April 30, 2019 by Messier
